column3: so didn't get to try a ton of stuff. But I did get the octopus
column5: tried the broccoli- which was good (rich
column9: BUT- I wouldn't recommend ordering if you're dining alone. It's just way too much of one single thing/flavor

column11: so was perfect to eat alone.
